component.name: Tiler
component.summary: Command-line tool for window tiling on X11

description.p: Tiler is a powerful command-line tool designed to automatically arrange and resize windows on X11 desktop environments. It provides flexible window tiling capabilities with support for various layout modes, aspect ratio control, and customizable margins.

ul.li: Multiple tiling modes: horizontal, vertical, and grid layouts
Aspect ratio control for consistent window proportions

description.p: Perfect for users who want to organize their workspace efficiently, whether working with a few applications or managing dozens of windows simultaneously.
Initial release of Tiler with full X11 window tiling functionality.

ul.li: Support for horizontal, vertical, and grid tiling modes
Aspect ratio control and margin configuration
